title: States And Businesses Continue Playing The Keystone XL Waiting Game
teaser: What would happen if the Keystone XL pipeline does not go ahead? NPR's Arun Rath talks with Peter Schwiering of Rose Rock Midstream, a crude oil storage company in Cushing, Okla.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
